testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.message: Excellent driving school! The instructor was patient and professional. I passed my test on the first try!

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.message: Great experience learning to drive. The lessons were well-structured and I felt confident behind the wheel.

testimonials.name: Emma Williams
testimonials.message: Highly recommend! The instructor made learning to drive manual transmission easy and stress-free.

testimonials.name: James Anderson
testimonials.message: The dual control system gave me so much confidence. I felt safe learning with Drive It Yourself.

testimonials.name: Lisa Thompson
testimonials.message: Flexible scheduling and convenient pickup service. The instructor was knowledgeable and friendly.
